content:
Still need a room for the Cologne WGM?
Yesterday I heard a surgical procedure on my wife's ankle has been scheduled for May 14th - so I'll have to cancel my attendance at the Cologne WGM. I have a non-refundable booking for May 11 to 17th at https://www.adagio-city.com/gb/hotel-8288-aparthotel-adagio-koln-city/index.shtml (serviced apartment, 100 meters from the conference hotel). Cancellation means paying a 95%+ penalty. Do you still need a room? This one's available cheaply.
Please contact me via private message or e-mail.
